verses.name: Isaiah 46:7
verses.text: They bear him upon the shoulder, they carry him, and set him in his place, and he standeth; from his place shall he not remove: yea, one shall cry unto him, yet can he not answer, nor save him out of his trouble.

verses.name: Isaiah 46:8
verses.text: Remember this, and shew yourselves men: bring it again to mind, O ye transgressors.

verses.name: Isaiah 46:9
verses.text: Remember the former things of old: for I am God, and there is none else; I am God, and there is none like me,
